entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain showers or flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
